(2) NOTE: In October all AERT members in good
standing became individual members of the
NAEB. At the same time all individuals who
held affiliate memberships were changed to
individual members, the affiliate category
now including only organisations
Since this directory went to press too early
to include all these changes, it is issued
on the bassis of pre AERT-NAEB merger records
and does not include reclassifications which
are in progress.
